user.title: MAM Manager
user.description: Connect to MyAnonamouse. Either enter your **User ID** and **MAM session cookie**, or log in with **Username (email)** and **Password** to obtain a session automatically. When you provide username and password, we will verify the login works before saving.

data_description.user_id: Your MAM user ID (numeric). Optional if logging in with username/password.
data_description.mam_id: Cookie value from your browser after logging in. Leave blank if using username/password.
data_description.username: Your MAM login email. Use this with password to obtain a session automatically.
data_description.password: Your MAM login password. Stored for re-login; only first 5 characters are shown in options.

error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to MAM. Check user ID and cookie, or username and password.
error.invalid_user_id: User ID must be a number.
error.missing_credentials: Enter either User ID + session cookie, or Username + Password.
error.invalid_auth: Login failed. Check username and password.
error.user_id_required: We could not detect your user ID. Please enter your MAM user ID (numeric).
